verses.verse: Be merciful<WH2603> unto me<WH430>, O God: for man<WH582> would swallow me up<WH7602>; he fighting<WH3898> daily<WH3117> oppresses me<WH3905>.
My enemies<WH8324> would daily<WH3117> swallow<WH7602> me up<WH7227>: for they be many that fight<WH3898> against me<WH4791>, O you most High.
What time<WH3117> I am afraid<WH3372>, I will trust in you<WH982>.
In God<WH430> I will praise<WH1984> his word<WH1697>, in God<WH430> I have put my trust<WH982>; I will not fear<WH3372> what flesh<WH1320> can do unto me<WH6213>.
Every day<WH3117> they bend<WH6087> my words<WH1697>: all their thoughts<WH4284> are against me for evil<WH7451>.
They gather themselves together<WH1481>, they hide<WH6845> themselves<WH8104>, they mark my steps<WH6119>, when they wait<WH6960> for my soul<WH5315>.
Shall they escape<WH6405> by iniquity<WH205>? in your anger<WH639> cast down<WH3381> the people<WH5971>, O God<WH430>.
You tell<WH5608> my wanderings<WH5112>: put<WH7760> you my tears<WH1832> into your bottle<WH4997>: are they not in your book<WH5612>?
When<WH3117> I cry<WH7121> unto you<WH341>, then shall my enemies turn<WH7725> back<WH268>: this I know<WH3045>; for God is for me<WH430>.
In God<WH430> will I praise<WH1984> his word<WH1697>: in the Lord<WH3068> will I praise<WH1984> his word<WH1697>.
In God<WH430> have I put my trust<WH982>: I will not be afraid<WH3372> what man<WH120> can do unto me<WH6213>.
Your vows<WH5088> are upon me<WH430>, O God: I will render<WH7999> praises unto you<WH8426>.

For you have delivered<WH5337> my soul<WH5315> from death<WH4194>: will not you deliver my feet<WH7272> from falling<WH1762>, that I may walk<WH1980> before<WH6440> God<WH430> in the light<WH216> of the living<WH2416>?
